attributes.additional_details:
People who work part time (under 10 hours) and can still claim Job Seekers Allowence, earn less than £60 a week.
But the DWP then take £55 away from your Benifit.
Leaving you with only £5, of your hard earned money.
And then expecting you to pay and extra £12 rent.

That means you work 10 hours and you lose money.
This isnt fair at all and doesnt make sence.

YOU SHOULD ALLOW PEOPLE TO EARN UPTO £50 A WEEK AND STILL CLAIM BENIFITS.

THIS WOULD STOP/REDUCE BENIFIT FRAUD
